text:
Pappukutty Bhagavathar (; 29 March 1913 – 22 June 2020) was an Indian singer and actor. His works were in Malayalam cinema. He was born in Kochi, India. His best known roles were in "Sthreehridayam", "Sree Guruvayoorappan" and in "Kattukurangu".
Bhagavathar died of heart failure in New Delhi on 22 June 2020, aged 107.
